mapper.insert: insert into basket (userNum, menuNum, basketCount, basketPTotal, reservationNum) values (#{userNum}, #{menuNum}, #{basketCount}, #{basketPTotal}, #{reservationNum})
mapper.select: select b.reservationNum, r.reservationDate, r.reservationNumber, r.reservationRequest, m.menuName, b.basketCount, b.basketPTotal from basket b join reservation r on b.reservationNum = r.reservationNum join menu m on b.menuNum = m.menuNum where b.userNum = #{userNum} order by b.reservationNum desc
